name: Guru Purnima
description: Guru Purnima is a spiritual tradition dedicated to spiritual and academic teachers...
poojaVidhi: Wake up early and take a holy bath.
Place a photo or idol of your Guru or spiritual teacher.
Offer flowers, fruits, and chant 'Guru Brahma Guru Vishnu...'.
Perform aarti and recite Guru mantra.

name: Raksha Bandhan
description: Celebrates the bond between brothers and sisters.
poojaVidhi: Sisters tie rakhi on brothers' wrists.

name: Janmashtami
description: Marks the birth of Lord Krishna.

name: Ganesh Chaturthi
description: Festival celebrating the birth of Lord Ganesha.
poojaVidhi: Chant Ganesh mantras and perform aarti.

name: Navratri
description: Nine nights dedicated to Goddess Durga.
poojaVidhi: Perform daily aarti and recite Durga stuti.
